text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with chef love i shot a lot of film
down at Pebble Beach at the Grand
Tasting but nothing touched my heart
like this interlude at the cookbook
signing table with chef Eric repair
there he was kind of bored going through
the motions and suddenly a young woman
approached the table who loved him from
afar for many years he had never met her
he didn't know her name but when she
handed him that apron and he signed it
and handed it back and saw the look in
her eye everything changed suddenly the
chef knew he had found his one true love
